citations.narrative:
A search for unlicensed activity was initiated by complaint/search. Searched YouTube website pages that have examples
of activity covered under the Animal Welfare Act. The individual is exhibiting a non-human primate in videos requiring paid
access and selling merchandise with pictures of the individual with the non-human primate. My first visit to this individual
occurred on May 1, 2023 at 2:15 pm; I knocked on the door and called out for this individual with no response. The next
visit occurred on May 23, 2023 at 12:45 pm. During this second visit to the house, I left a business card with a request for
her to call me to discuss my reason for attempting to contact her. On May 30, 2023, a letter and application kit were
mailed to the individual by certified mail. On June 26, 2023 I searched online for phone numbers with no success. All
numbers I found were assigned to others or disconnected. The final attempt to contact the individual occurred on July 20,
2023 at 1:15 pm. During this attempt I knocked on the door and called out for her with no response. I left a blue book with
the highlighted section 2.1 (a) (1) Any person operating or intending to operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an
auction sale, except persons who are exempted from the licensing requirements under paragraph (a)(3) of this section,
must have a valid license. As of September 29, 2023 youtube videos are still posting with individual and a non-human
primate. This individual, based on the acquired information, is currently operating as an exhibitor and requires a license
issued by USDA Animal Care.
Since multiple attempts to make contact with the unlicensed facility were unsuccessful, no inspection or exit interview
were able to be conducted with a representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
A search for unlicensed activity was initiated by complaint/search. Searched YouTube website pages that have examples 
of activity covered under the Animal Welfare Act. The individual is exhibiting a non-human primate in videos requiring paid 
access and selling merchandise with pictures of the individual with the non-human primate. My first visit to this individual 
occurred on May 1, 2023 at 2:15 pm; I knocked on the door and called out for this individual with no response. The next 
visit occurred on May 23, 2023 at 12:45 pm. During this second visit to the house, I left a business card with a request for 
her to call me to discuss my reason for attempting to contact her. On May 30, 2023, a letter and application kit were 
mailed to the individual by certified mail. On June 26, 2023 I searched online for phone numbers with no success. All 
numbers I found were assigned to others or disconnected. The final attempt to contact the individual occurred on July 20, 
2023 at 1:15 pm. During this attempt I knocked on the door and called out for her with no response. I left a blue book with 
the highlighted section 2.1 (a) (1) Any person operating or intending to operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an 
auction sale, except persons who are exempted from the licensing requirements under paragraph (a)(3) of this section, 
must have a valid license. As of September 29, 2023 youtube videos are still posting with individual and a non-human 
primate. This individual, based on the acquired information, is currently operating as an exhibitor and requires a license 
issued by USDA Animal Care. 
 
Since multiple attempts to make contact with the unlicensed facility were unsuccessful, no inspection or exit interview 
were able to be conducted with a representative. 
 
 n
